text: Cinderella Castle (or Cinderella Palace) is the fairy tale castle at the center of two Disney theme parks: the Magic Kingdom at the Walt Disney World Resort, and Tokyo Disneyland at the Tokyo Disney Resort. Both castles are recognized all over the world. They are the main attraction for each of the theme parks. Category:Magic Kingdom Category:Castles Category:1971 establishments in Florida Category:Tokyo Disneyland Category:Walt Disney World
title: Cinderella Castle
